nodes.bodyText: Out of curiousity, how comes you added these DROP TABLE statements? Nothing speaking against it, just curious :)

Well, because table with same name was already created in this same test, 10 lines above.
Options were to DROP it and CREATE, ot CREATE under another name.
I do not know much context of what exactly is being tested in this unit test, maybe creating it under new name would be actually better :)
